summary: Retextures the moonstone inlays in circlets to match the crafting material.
descriptionHtml:
This changes the moonstone circlet inlays from blue to milky white, matching the moonstone crafting material.

INSTALL/UNINSTALL
This mod consists of a single 512x512 texture, packaged in a folder structure compatible with Skyrim's. Use the Mod Manager or extract the "textures" folder to "\Skyrim\Data\" to install.

To uninstall, use the Mod Manager, or delete "circletstones.dds" in the "Skyrim\Data\textures\armor\circlets\" folder.
author: Ithronyar
